page.title: 03FARMING
page.content: The greater part of the whole area is devoted to {ARABLE FARMING.} During 1985 the main crops grown were: {WHEAT, BARLEY, , OIL SEED RAPE} Most farms are large (500 acres+) and fields are also large (over 10 acres). There is often controversy over the fact that hedgerows are often destroyed. Wheat was selling at about #100 per tonne and yields of 4 tonnes per acre were obtained. (1985) The growing of oil seed rape is a recent introduction (last 5-6 years) and although the sight of huge yellow bands of colour is appealing, many folk consider that the fragrance causes headaches.
